data.title: Yellowstone spin-off: Will Kurt Russell be the lead star in the next chapter?
data.meta_description: Many people are watching to see what will happen in the coming seasons of the main Yellowstone show. The fans are very curious to know who will play the lead roles in the coming season of Yellowstone.
data.text:
Synopsis

Many people are watching to see what will happen in the coming seasons of the main Yellowstone show. The fans are very curious to know who will play the lead roles in the coming season of Yellowstone.

People are excited to know what will happen next in Yellowstone. The TV series is said to be ending soon. As per the reports of ScreenRant, the lead actor for a new spinoff of Yellowstone has been cast. The narrative of the program, which was written by Taylor Sheridan, centres around the Dutton family and their ranch next to a national park. It began in 2018 and now consists of two prequel spinoffs, one featuring Tim McGraw and the other with Helen Mirren and Harrison Ford.

Notably, a new report from The InSneider (via JoBlo) says that Kurt Russell might star in a spinoff of the TV show Yellowstone. It's not clear which spinoff he's being considered for.

All we know about the Yellowstone spin-offs

Kurt Russell might be considered for any of the three spinoff shows being worked on. One of these shows, set in modern times, called 6666, has been facing trouble getting made since 2022.

The main Yellowstone show is still going strong, focusing on the Four Sixes Ranch in Texas. There are also plans for sequels to the main show and a prequel called 1922, which will explore more of the Dutton family's story. For almost a year, Matthew McConaughey has been in discussions to star in one of these projects.

Yellowstone: Cast

As reported by ScreenRant, casting Western genre veterans for a variety of roles has worked well for the Yellowstone franchise. Actors including Graham Greene, Billy Bob Thornton, and Sam Elliott appeared in the program 1883. Similar casting choices were made in 1923 for performers with prior expertise in the genre, including Ford, Timothy Dalton, and Robert Patrick. Actors having experience in the Western genre are a bonus for the casting of the show.

FAQs:

Who are some notable actors in the 1923 spinoff?

Ford, Timothy Dalton, and Robert Patrick starred in the 1923 spinoff.

Who has been in talks for a new Yellowstone project?

Matthew McConaughey has been in talks for nearly a year.
